title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4210.5 - Radio, video contracts to be filed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4210.5 - Radio, video contracts to be filed

State Regulations

Each licensed quarter horse track shall furnish to the
commission a full and complete copy of each and every proposed agreement for
radio broadcasts or video telecast of any part of the program or any other
incident at their respective racecourse during the racing season at least 10
days prior to the execution of any such agreement by such
track. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4210.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
